sorcer.core.monitor

Interface MonitorUIManagement

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MonitoringManagement
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExertMonitor

    public interface MonitorUIManagement
    An interface for UI to interact with the monitor. Get all the refIDs and monitored exertion info for a particular credential. The refID will be the combination of serviceID which is globally unique and the referenceID for the exertion. This referenceID is also required by the monitorable to be passed back to the MonitorableService (ie, the MonitorManager) to control the exertion execution. The spec requires that the implementation of this interface gets all the monitored exertions for the particular user credentials.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Exertion getMonitorableExertion(UEID cookie, java.security.Principal credentials)
      For this reference ID, which references a exertion in a monitor, get the exertion if the principal has enough credentials.
      Exertion getMonitorableExertion(net.jini.id.Uuid id, java.security.Principal credentials)
      For this reference ID, which references a exertion in a datastore, get the exertion if the client has enough credentials.
      java.util.Map<net.jini.id.Uuid,ExertionInfo> getMonitorableExertionInfo(Exec.State aspect, java.security.Principal principal)
      The spec requires that this method gets all the monitorable exertion infos from all the monitor managers and return a Hashtable where key -> ExertionReferenceID value -> Some info regarding this exertion
      net.jini.core.event.EventRegistration register(java.security.Principal principal, net.jini.core.event.RemoteEventListener listener, long duration)
      The register method creates a leased EventRegistration for the notification of sorcer.core.monitor.MonitorEvent events that correspond to exertions being monitored for a provided Principal.

      • register

        net.jini.core.event.EventRegistration register(java.security.Principal principal,
                                               net.jini.core.event.RemoteEventListener listener,
                                               long duration)
                                        throws net.jini.core.lease.LeaseDeniedException,
                                               java.rmi.RemoteException
        The register method creates a leased EventRegistration for the notification of sorcer.core.monitor.MonitorEvent events that correspond to exertions being monitored for a provided Principal. type passed in based on the requested lease duration. The implied semantics of notification are dependant on org.rioproject.event.EventHandler specializations.
        Parameters:
        principal - The Principal identifying events that match the provided Principal. If null, all Exertions will be matched.
        listener - A RemoteEventListener.
        duration - Requested EventRegistration lease duration
        Returns:
        An EventRegistration
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the parameters are null
        net.jini.core.lease.LeaseDeniedException - if the duration parameter is not accepted
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if communication errors occur
